yanwittmann.types

Class ImageEditor

  • java.lang.Object
    • yanwittmann.types.ImageEditor

  • public class ImageEditor
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is still work in progress, but can be used to read an image file and edit individual pixels.
    This class has been written by Yan Wittmann.
    Author:
    Yan Wittmann
